name: John Smith
description: John Smith is a professional chef with over 10 years of experience. He loves to experiment with new ingredients and techniques to create unique and delicious dishes.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Mix soy sauce, honey, olive oil, and garlic powder in a bowl. 2. Brush the mixture onto the salmon fillets. 3. Grill the salmon on medium-high heat for 5-6 minutes on each side. 4. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Roasted Vegetables
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Preheat the oven to 425°F. 2. Toss the vegetables with olive oil and salt. 3. Spread the vegetables evenly on a baking sheet. 4. Roast in the oven for 20-25 minutes or until the vegetables are tender and slightly browned. 5. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Preheat the oven to 375°F. 2. Mix breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and oregano in a bowl. 3. Coat the chicken breasts with the breadcrumb mixture. 4. Place the chicken breasts in a baking dish and pour marinara sauce over the top. 5. Sprinkle shredded mozzarella cheese over the top. 6. Bake in the oven for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked

name: Carlos Ramirez
description: Carlos Ramirez is a skilled chef with over 12 years of experience. He loves to experiment with different cuisines and create unique dishes that are bursting with flavor.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 2. Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, parsley, salt, and black pepper in a bowl. 3. Brush the salmon fillets with the olive oil mixture. 4. Place the salmon fillets on the grill skin-side down. 5. Grill for 6-8 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through. 6. Serve with your favorite sides.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. Reserve 1/4 cup of pasta water, then drain the rest. 3. In a skillet, toast pine nuts over medium heat for 2-3 minutes or until golden brown. 4. Add pesto sauce and reserved pasta water to the skillet and stir to combine. 5. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat. 6. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese and a drizzle of olive oil.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin, cut into thin strips
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 2. Add beef strips and cook until browned. 3. Add onion, garlic, and mushrooms and sauté for 2-3 minutes or until softened. 4. Sprinkle flour over the mixture and stir to combine. 5. Add beef broth and bring to a boil. 6. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes or until the sauce has thickened. 7. Stir in sour cream and season with salt and pepper. 8. Serve over egg noodles.
